CommandDefinition.Name: buildapplicationversion
CommandDefinition.Description: Build a new version of an application and copy all objects from the workingset to a new revision.

Argument.Name: comment
Argument.Description: A comment to describe the version.

Argument.Name: excludeSubtypesOf
Argument.Description: Base types whose subtypes are taken into the new version only when they are directly needed (by default subtypes of service-outputs will be included automatically into the new version). Use '*' to take no subtypes automatically.

Argument.Name: parentWorkspace
Argument.Description: The name of the parent workspace.

BoolOption.Name: s
BoolOption.Description: Build the application as remote stub.
